mapper.select: SELECT s_score.id, s_score.sid, s_score.course_id, s_course.NAME as courseName, score, remark, s_student.username as sName, class_name as className FROM s_score, s_student, s_course, s_class WHERE s_score.sid = s_student.sid AND s_course.id = s_score.course_id AND s_score.class_id = s_class.class_id;
mapper.insert: insert into s_score(class_id,sid,course_id,score) values ((select class_id from s_student where s_student.sid = #{sid}),#{sid},#{course_id},#{score});
